A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I have finally seen this movie. I grew up with Star Wars and I think that whoever wrote the movie does not know Luke Skywalker. His character is not this person of the film. I feel as the franchise will continue to make money\, they dont care about people who grew up with them. I prefer my daughter to watch the originals\, at least they make sense. I hope people wi stop acting like it's a good movie\, its not.
